title: BRIEF-China National Chemical Engineering's Unit Wins Contract Worth 5.5 Bln Yuan In India
text:
BRIEF-China National Chemical Engineering's Unit Wins Contract Worth 5.5 Bln Yuan In India

Stock Markets 17 minutes ago (Sep 17, 2019 16:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-China National Chemical Engineering's Unit Wins Contract Worth 5.5 Bln Yuan In India Sept 17 (Reuters) - China National Chemical Engineering Co Ltd : * SAYS UNIT WINS BID FOR ENGINEERING CONTRACT WORTH ABOUT 5.5 BILLION YUAN ($775.11 million) WITH INDIA'S TALCHER FERTILIZERS

BRIEF-China National Chemical Engineering's Unit Wins Contract Worth 5.5 Bln Yuan In India
